com.topcoder.search.builder.ldap
Class LDAPConnectionInformation

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.ldap.LDAPConnectionInformation
public class LDAPConnectionInformation
extends java.lang.Object

This class includes all the information needed to create a LDAP connection.

The class is thread safe, since it is immutable

Version:
1.3
Author:
ShindouHikaru, TCSDEVELOPER

Constructor Detail

LDAPConnectionInformation

public LDAPConnectionInformation(com.topcoder.util.net.ldap.sdkinterface.LDAPSDK factory,
                                 java.lang.String host,
                                 int port,
                                 boolean isSecure,
                                 int scope,
                                 java.lang.String dnroot,
                                 java.lang.String password)

Create a new instance by setting all the members in the class.

Parameters:
factory - a LDAPSDK object used to create a LDAP connection
host - host name
port - port number of the host
isSecure - a boolean indicating whether we need to create a ssl connection or regular connection
scope - the search scope
dnroot - the dnroot(user) to bind the ldapserver it can be null or empyt,denote anonymous search.
password - the password to bind the ldapserver it can be null or empyt,denote anonymous search.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is Null or the host is an empty string, or port has 0 or negative integers

LDAPConnectionInformation

public LDAPConnectionInformation(java.util.Properties properties)

Create a new instance via the properties. The properties should include all the members the class required. Also the mothed check the members in the properties whether they are valid.

Parameters:
properties - Property used to construct the instance
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any member in the properties is illegal
